message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $13,500.  This is a fair price given the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,500. I'm still a bit above that, so I was thinking of $13,200. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stretch my budget as far as I can. Can you meet me at that price?
